greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Index of first occurrence of exactly n consecutive fours in a row in the decimal expansion of Pi.
comment: First differs from A050283 at n = 10. In particular, a(10) > a(11) while A050283(10) = A050283(11) = a(11). - _Dmitry Petukhov_, Jan 25 2020
link: Peter Trüb, 22.4 trillion digits of pi
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 07 2004
